segments.text: Yes . I'd like this shirt to be dry-cleaned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . When do you want to get it back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to wear it this afternoon . Do you have a urgent service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but we charge 50 % more and it only takes 3 hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . How much should I pay ?
segments.speaker: S2
